sentences.en: But for now, Olympus needs your unquestionable obedience.
sentences.cn: 可是现在, 奥林匹斯需要你毫无质疑的绝对服从.

sentences.en: For the centre - left Ta Nea too, the event was an unquestionable success.
sentences.cn: 中左翼报纸《塔尼》也认为这次开幕式毫无疑问是一次巨大的成功.

sentences.en: He a person of unquestionable principles.
sentences.cn: 他是个具有“完美”道德原则的人.

sentences.en: He inspires affection and respect as a man of unquestionable integrity.
sentences.cn: 他无可争议的忠诚正直赢得了人们的爱戴和尊敬。

sentences.en: He is a person of unquestionable principles.
sentences.cn: 他是个具有完美道德原则的人
他很诚实,这是毫无疑问的.

sentences.en: That voice was low, but firm and unquestionable.
sentences.cn: 那声音虽低, 却坚定而不容置疑.

sentences.en: The firm enjoys the fullest respect and unquestionable confidence in the business world.
sentences.cn: 该公司在实业界颇受尊敬,信誉很高.

sentences.en: The registration in this contest implies complete and unquestionable acceptance of these rules.
sentences.cn: 注册在这个竞赛,意味着完整的和不容置疑的接受这些规则.
证人出示了确凿的证据.

sentences.en: There is an unquestionable link between job losses and deteriorating services.
sentences.cn: 人员的裁减和服务质量的下降之间显然是有联系的。

sentences.en: We give and receive unquestionable trust.
sentences.cn: 我们对员工给予充分的信任.

trans.tran_cn: 毫无疑问的，确实的，无懈可击的，无可挑剔的，不成问题
trans.tran_en: If you describe something as unquestionable, you are emphasizing that it is so obviously true or real that nobody can doubt it
